headline.main: 1942 VICTORY CRY PLACARDS MOSCOW; Stalin's Slogan for Red Army Is Emblazoned on Banners in Capital's Streets

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, May 2 (U.P.) -- This capital of warring Russia was ablaze today with banners inscribed "The War Must Be Decided in 1942!" when foreign correspondents returned to it from Kuibyshew after an absence of four months.
